TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 40, "index": 41}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a wooden_shovel, I need to place 1 plank and 2 sticks in the crafting grid. The plank needs to be placed in the middle of the grid, and the sticks need to be placed below it. Therefore, I will move the plank from slot 22 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
